abstrac: Professional film editor for your business and personal film projects.
bio:
I have worked as a professional film and video editor for the past 7 years. 

I have a BA from NYU's Tisch School of The Arts and have worked as a supervising producer for many networks including,NBC, MTV, VH1, TLC, HGTV, DIY, and BET.  

I work form my home office on FCP 7 & 10 and mix my edits with animation, graphics, and music.  Many of my clients are monthly clients, whom I work with on an ongoing basis.

I create one of a kind custom films for my clients. I have a strong dedication to my work and will work over time to get your projects completed to perfection.

All projects must be paid  50%  via escrow before the work on your project begins. 
All projects are given 2 rough cuts and one final draft. Additional drafts are subject to a fee.

abstrac: Capturing life's happiest moments, one image at a time.
bio:
Looking for a photographer or videographer in the Miami-Dade Area?   
A Story Book Event has helped South Florida create memories of their special day 
for over 19 years.

Our photos combine an ideal blend of photojournalism, tradition and  FUN! You owe 
it to yourself to use a photographer or videographer you can trust.  With over 750 
events photographed in the Miami-Dade area, we have experience with all types of 
cultures and traditions, including Filipino, Greek, Catholic,  Mormon,  Jewish,  
Chinese and Armenian to name just a few!  Serving Miami-Dade, Broward and Palm 
Beach Counties.

We will design an album which will include traditional photos, photojournalism, and 
romantic images.  At A Story Book Event we are versatile enough to provide you with the photography style  you prefer! Click on Photo or Video Packages tab to see our affordable prices.

4.5 hours on Event
Visa, Master Card, Discover and American Express Accepted.

abstrac: Java, Eclipse RCP, VAADIN, iOS, Flex
bio:
I specialize in desktop solutions, tools and IDEs using Java and Eclipse RCP / plugin development. I have over 13 years of working experience as a software engineer, 7 years of which in SAP AG, currently developing scientific tools for petroleum engineers.

MSc degree in Computer Science. Java certified professional.

Occasionally I work on full-stack web application development and iOS mobile app development.

I prefer to work on a fixed budget when the requirements are clear and specified. I understand that this isn't always possible - in such cases I work in small steps of pre-estimated and agreed work for more flexibility.

For fixed price projects I require an upfront payment of about 20%.

All development work will be performed on the freelancer servers which shall be accessible to the client for review. All client source code will be under a strict secure control system and will be exported or delivered according the contract specifications.

Usually the product is delivered with a warranty covering the bug fixes for a certain period of time/usage.

I'm also available on Elance: https://www.elance.com/s/gepard-soft/

abstrac: Experienced Web Designer/Developer and Mobile App Developer
bio:
My strength lies in my ability to provide the most efficient and satisfying results possible to the clients. I believe in delivering not just a product or a software but the ultimate experience that brings out the positiveness and change ... change that can be a cause of happiness.

I have a very a good experience in web design and development. My skills include developing Enterprise level applications, mobile app development (Android & iOS etc), game designing and development (esp the ones in either Unity 3D or OpenGL), HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, Responsive Designing, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, Java (core, Hibernate, Spring, servlets, JSP, JSF, JSTL, JDBC), .NET Development( ASP .NET, C# etc) WordPress, PHP, Bootstrap, Human Computer Interaction testing, Software QA, C++/C/Objective-C application development.
I can work upto 40 hrs/week. I prefer hourly jobs but am open to fixed projects as well. Only contact me if you want a dedicated and a sincere developer.

Through my virtual office, I will instruct Home Health Agencies in setting up and learning Point-of-Care Software from the Intake Process to the RAP and Final Billing through your GPNet or Ivans interface. I have had several years working with Home Health Agencies & understand the complexities of shifting from one software to a newer one.
Supporting & problem solving Home Health Agencies through the Help desk for over 800 users.
Created software manual & instructions for peripheral equipment.
Trained new employees in all aspects of the point-of-care software and help desk environment..
Indoctrinated new staff members to the procedures, complexities and standards of the point-of-care software, the help Desk and homework procedures

Hours of operation are flexible to accommodate the different time zones. I will schedule my hours to fit your convenience. You may communicate with me through email at Jmdesignz@comcast.net. I prefer a direct deposit as a means of payment, which will be $45 per hour.
